description: Canonical definition of all governance-critical oversight parameters, structured for granular control and automated dependency injection.

groupDefinitions.SAFETY_CONTROL: Parameters defining hard limits and operational boundaries to ensure AI alignment and safety.
groupDefinitions.INTERNAL_STATE: Parameters governing the integrity and stability of internal representational models.
groupDefinitions.EXECUTION_SAFETY: Resource and time constraints for non-verified or experimental code execution.
groupDefinitions.EVOLUTION_RESOURCE: Resource allocation limits for autonomous self-modification and optimization cycles.
groupDefinitions.AUDIT_FREQUENCY: Timeliness requirements for mandatory systemic integrity checks.

SAFETY_CONTROL_RISK_FLOOR_RATIO.description: Maximum permitted deviation ratio from the measured baseline risk index (RBI). High severity.

INTERNAL_STATE_MAX_ENTROPY_DEBT.description: Threshold for initiating forced self-correction and internal stabilization procedures (Entropy Debt Management).

EXEC_SAFETY_SANDBOX_TIMEOUT_MS.description: Timeout (in milliseconds) for independent, unverified code execution sandbox processes.

EVOLUTION_RESOURCE_MAX_CYCLES.description: Maximum self-evolutionary generation attempts (cycles) allowed for a single objective before aborting or reverting.

AUDIT_FREQ_GOV_AUDIT_INTERVAL_HRS.description: Interval for mandatory full governance ledger audits (default 24 hours).
